title: Who's the NFL's version of Michael Jordan and who deserves a Last Dance style documentary? (Football 5/18)
description:
The Last Dance has captured sports fans attention for over a month focus on the incredible and unparalleled career of Michael Jordan. Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough attempt to find the NFL's equivalent to MJ and a long form documentary that could be of similar interest to MJ's feature. Is Tom Brady and the the New England Patriots dynasty the clear choice or do other stars stand out? Speaking of Brady, is he the most identifiable player in league history? The Jordan comparisons can be made but they might not be as close as you think. Also, it's a Mailbag MondayÂ ðŸ“¬ (43:00)Â ! Leave a 5-star review with a question attached on Apple Podcasts and the Superfriends will answer if for you!

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @JohnBreech, @seanjwagner

Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
